description:
There are 404 pages, and then there’s Donald Duck celebrating 50 years in showbusiness with the Clintons.










 

 
	If you happen to be browsing Hillary Clinton's official website and you somehow come across a bad link, you'll see this:

   
 
	


 hillaryclinton.com














 

 
	It's Hillary, Bill and a very young Chelsea standing with Donald Duck in 1984. Everyone has excellent hats.

   
 
	He was celebrating 50 years in showbusiness. The duck, that is, not Bill Clinton.


 hillaryclinton.com














 















 





View Entire List ›
title: People Love The Error Page On Hillary Clinton's Website
